title: Lucas Costa Amaral - Senior Front End Developer
description: Senior Front End Developer, specialized in React.js, React Native and Node.js. Get in touch!

Hey, my name is 'Lucas', 27 years old, living in 'Tubarão, SC, Brazil', and I’m a front end developer.
My development career started in a very different way. Back in 2016, I started a psychology degree
because I had won a scholarship. But I quickly realized that it wasn’t for me. So, I had to make
the tough decision to give up the scholarship and go after something that made more sense for me.
That same year, I enrolled in an IT course in my city, mainly because (<s>I didn’t want my parents</s>
<s>lecturing me for doing nothing at home</s>) I’ve always had an affinity for computers since I was a kid.
Honestly, before starting the course, I thought I’d learn things like formatting computers or fixing hardware.
But... I was so wrong! When I started learning about programming logic and algorithms, that’s when
it hit me—this is what I wanted to do with my life (as weird as that might sound).
I’ve loved programming logic from the very beginning and spent a lot of time studying on my own.
Eventually, I got my first internship in 2017, and I haven’t stopped since.
Over the years, I’ve worked with various programming languages. I started with Delphi, moved to PHP, Vanilla JS,
JQuery, AngularJS, and eventually found my way to my favorites: 'React.js' and 'Node.js'.
That’s when I decided to specialize for real. Since then, I’ve been working with 'React.js' for web development,
'React Native' for mobile app development, and 'Node.js' for API creation.
